DOC.brief_title: New Strategies Assess Anal Cancer Risk In Women
DOC.detailed_description: Investigators seek study different strategy identify woman high risk anal cancer . Primarily , investigator want study risk assessment call Anal Cancer Risk Index ; give woman overall number score base risk factor may anal cancer , age , number sexual partner , smoke . The study team would like determine whether woman higher Anal Cancer Risk Index score likely abnormal result anal pap smear , HPV test , anal biopsy . Next , team collect swab cervix swab anus study different laboratory test could identify woman high risk anal cancer : test include anal pap smear test detect HPV type likely cause cancer . Investigators would like see laboratory test best job predict precancerous lesion anus . After collect swab , woman procedure call high resolution anoscopy investigator look closely anus biopsy suspicious area . Finally , study team look HPV proteins change HPV make cell see test predict anal lesion . The HPV protein call E6 E7 cell change test call CADM1/MAL/miR-124-2 . Investigators measure E6/E7 CADM1/MAL/miR-124-2 cervical anal sample see woman positive marker likely abnormal result anal pap smear anal biopsy .
DOC.criteria: Currently enrol Women 's HIV Interagency Study ( WIHS ) study Able willing undergo anal cytology , anal molecular testing , high resolution anoscopy target anal biopsy History high grade anal intraepithelial neoplasia ( AIN 2 3 ) History active anal disease require surgery History anal cervical cancer
